author: jerenkrantz
msg: * context.c
(write_to_connection): Remove two unused vars and key off right "did we read?"
variable.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow a bucket to morph into a request bucket.
* buckets/request_buckets.c
(serf_bucket_request_become): Morph a bucket into a request bucket.
* serf_bucket_types.h
(serf_bucket_request_become): Declare

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * buckets/aggregate_buckets.c
(serf_aggregate_read_iovec): Return EOF if we are empty.

author: gstein
msg: Add some path searching for the ap{r,u}-config files. Also, pick up the
correct version (e.g. apr-1-config).
* serfmake:
(class ConfigScript): new base class for -config scripts
(class APRConfig, class APUCONFIG): set the class constant for the right
script name.
(class ConfigScriptNotFound): new exception when a -config cannot be
found on the path.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Two minor nits and a real bug fix.
* buckets/aggregate_buckets.c
(read_aggregate): Avoid needless set of *len = 0 when we already know that
it must be set to 0 (otherwise this clause wouldn't have triggered).
(serf_aggregate_read_iovec): Ensure i gets incremented even if we get a
non-zero status return.
